==Translingual==

===Etymology===
{{Han simp|貨|f=貝|t=贝}}.

In current form, {{Han compound|化|贝|t2=shell, money|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s}} – valuable goods. 化 means “change”, so also connotation of “valuable goods that are exchanged, commodities”.

===Han character===
